update WX_ACCOUNT
SHOP_ID = #{record.shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SHOP_NM = #{record.shopNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
G_CORP_ID = #{record.gCorpId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MKT_ID = #{record.mktId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

WX_API_TOKEN = #{record.wxApiToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WX_IS_USE_QUIK_FOLLOW = #{record.wxIsUseQuikFollow,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CORP_NM = #{record.corpNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CORP_LICENSE_NO = #{record.corpLicenseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CONTACT_EMAIL = #{record.contactEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CONTACT_HEADIMG = #{record.contactHeadimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADR_PROVINCE_ID = #{record.adrProvinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ADR_CITY_ID = #{record.adrCityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ADR_DISTRICT_ID = #{record.adrDistrictId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ADR_DETAIL = #{record.adrDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADR_ZIP = #{record.adrZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADR_TEL = #{record.adrTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SC_ID = #{record.scId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MAIN_GC_ID = #{record.mainGcId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SG_ID = #{record.sgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STS_ID = #{record.stsId,jdbcType=TINYINT},
STS_DESC = #{record.stsDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPENED_DT = #{record.openedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CLOSED_DT = #{record.closedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AUTH_TYPE_ID = #{record.authTypeId,jdbcType=TINYINT},
AUTH_IS_SUCC = #{record.authIsSucc,jdbcType=TINYINT},
AUTH_IMG_CERT_1 = #{record.authImgCert1,jdbcType=BIGINT},
AUTH_IMG_CERT_2 = #{record.authImgCert2,jdbcType=BIGINT},
AUTH_IMG_CERT_3 = #{record.authImgCert3,jdbcType=BIGINT},

IMG_LOGO_PIC = #{record.imgLogoPic,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IMG_LOGO_LABEL = #{record.imgLogoLabel,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IMG_BANNER = #{record.imgBanner,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IMG_WATERMARK = #{record.imgWatermark,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IMG_2D_BARCODE = #{record.img2dBarcode,jdbcType=BIGINT},

AVG_SERVICE_SCORE = #{record.avgServiceScore,jdbcType=TINYINT},
AVG_DELIVERY_RATE = #{record.avgDeliveryRate,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CREATED_USER_ID = #{record.createdUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIED_DT = #{record.modifiedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_DT = #{record.createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LEGAL_PERSON_INRTODUCE = #{record.legalPersonInrtoduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESC_INTRODUCTION = #{record.descIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESC_BEFORE_SALES = #{record.descBeforeSales,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESC_AFTER_SALES = #{record.descAfterSales,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESC_WORKINGTIME = #{record.descWorkingtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
